name: 10 Custom Buttons (SAME DESIGN!)
description:
These buttons are great for bands, promoting events, and make great accessories! 10 1.5" quality buttons with pin.
ALL 10 have the same design on them.
Use your own design!
Send me the design you want as a button in an e-mail first!
Be sure to put your order number as the subject and include the picture you want on the button as an attachment.
If you want more than 10 buttons, change the quantity in your shopping cart (ex. 2 = 20 buttons, 3 = 30 buttons, etc.)
ABSOLUTELY NO RESTRICTIONS ON YOUR DESIGN! :]


EMAIL DESIGNS TO: allthesmallthingsdesign@yahoo.com

name: Custom Digitally Inked (Cartoony) Graphics
description:
Love the "cartoony" effect that alot of bands have on their t-shirts and websites?
Do you think getting one for your band is expensive?

Well think again!

Here at All The Small Things! Design, you can get one of these cool graphics at a low price!

BEFORE YOU PAY: send an e-mail with what you want to:

allthesmallthingsdesign@yahoo.com

Be sure to indicate the genre of music of your band, likes and dislikes, and an idea of what you want.

If you don't know what you want, just say "ANYTHING GOES!" and I'll make you something special! :]

I'll send you the finished product in an e-mail within a week of payment in .jpg , photoshop, and illustrator files.
